title: karpaka manOhara
sahitya:
karpaka manOharA kAttaruL krpAkarA


anupallavi

  cirpara kapAlIsha tirumayilaipuri vaLarum


caraNam    unadaDi paNindilEn ulagelAm tozhum Ishan
unadu tirunAmam tanai uLam kaninduraittilEn
annaiyum en tandaiyum nIyanrri vEronrariyA
agadi nAnenrunakku pughalvadO en annai
